text:
The mod_filter.so module was not included in the binary build
"apache_2.2.4-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi"

There is also not LoadModule mod_filter entry in the default httpd.conf that
comes with Apache 2.2.4 for Windows.
creator: Rodney.D.Beede-1@ou.edu

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> The mod_filter.so module was not included in the binary build
> "apache_2.2.4-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi"

now, apache_2.2.6-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi contains mod_filter.so

> There is also not LoadModule mod_filter entry in the default httpd.conf that
> comes with Apache 2.2.4 for Windows.

fixed in r580257
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=580257
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
